Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.View.ObservableModelView
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.View.ClientModel
public class ClientModel extends ObservableModelView
The ClientModel class is responsible for maintaining the state of the game client, including player-related data, game phase, and game components. It extends the ObservableModelView to provide notify methods for observers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientModel()
    Constructs a new ClientModel and initializes it to the setup phase.
